item.title: 淡水河谷矿业公司董事长称董事会优先选择首席执行官以避免市场噪音
item.description: 巴西矿业公司淡水河谷董事会主席丹尼尔-斯蒂勒（Daniel Stieler）周二告诉路透社，董事会已将确定公司新任首席执行官的工作列为优先事项，以避免市场上出现更多有关潜在候选人的声音。【原文：The board of directors of Brazil miner Vale has prioritized the works of defining a new chief executive for the company to avoid further noises in the market regarding potential candidates, its Chairman Daniel Stieler told Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国宏观经济、英伟达阴影挥之不去，亚洲看局部
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 沃尔玛推出新的市场卖家服务，为假日促销助力
item.description: 沃尔玛周二表示，它将为市场卖家提供服务，将他们的商品从亚洲直接运到美国仓库，并履行订单和管理来自任何电子商务网站的退货，这是它在假日季到来之前加强市场业务的一种新方法。【原文：Walmart said on Tuesday it would provide marketplace sellers its services to handle transportation of their goods from Asia directly to its U.S. warehouses, as well as fulfill orders and manage returns from any e-commerce website, in a new approach to bolstering its marketplace business ahead of the holiday season.】

item.title: 据 The Information 报道，TikTok 内容战略主管将离职
item.description: 据 The Information 周二援引一份发给员工的说明报道，TikTok 的内容战略和政策主管妮可-伊科佩蒂（Nicole Iacopetti）将于 9 月 6 日离职。【原文：TikTok's head of content strategy and policy, Nicole Iacopetti, will leave the company on Sept. 6, The Information reported on Tuesday, citing a note sent to staff.】

item.title: 诺德斯特龙（Nordstrom）第二季度收入因销售活动的推动而增长，股价大涨
item.description: 诺德斯特龙（Nordstrom）周二公布的第二季度销售增长好于预期，这主要得益于其关键的周年促销活动，尽管消费者在通胀压力下仍持谨慎态度，但该公司股价在盘后交易中上涨了 11%。【原文：Nordstrom reported a better-than-expected growth in second-quarter sales on Tuesday, buoyed by its crucial Anniversary Sale event, even as consumers remain cautious amid inflationary pressures, sending its shares up 11% in extended trading.】

item.title: 美国称转基因小麦可安全种植，但尚待试验
item.description: 美国农业部周二表示，阿根廷 Bioceres Crop Solutions 公司开发的一种转基因小麦可以在美国安全种植和培育。【原文：A type of genetically modified wheat developed by Argentina's Bioceres Crop Solutions may be safely grown and bred in the United States, the U.S. Department of Agriculture said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国商品期货交易委员会：TOTSA TotalEnergies Trading 将为企图操纵市场支付 480 万美元
item.description: 美国商品市场监管机构周二勒令瑞士能源交易商 TOTSA TotalEnergies Trading SA 支付 4800 万美元的罚款，指控该公司试图操纵欧洲基准汽油期货市场。【原文：The U.S. commodity markets regulator on Tuesday ordered the Swiss energy trader TOTSA TotalEnergies Trading SA to pay a $48 million fine, alleging that the company had attempted to manipulate the market for European benchmark gasoline futures.】

item.title: 自动驾驶卡车公司 TuSimple 以 1.89 亿美元和解欺诈诉讼
item.description: TuSimple就一起诉讼达成了 1.89 亿美元的和解协议，该诉讼指控这家自动驾驶卡车技术公司通过夸大其安全记录和隐瞒三名内部人士对一家中国卡车运输竞争对手的控制权来欺骗股东。【原文：TuSimple reached a $189 million settlement of a lawsuit accusing the self-driving truck technology company of defrauding shareholders by overstating its safety record and concealing three insiders' control of a Chinese trucking rival.】

item.title: 美国缉毒局将大麻重新分类听证会推迟到 12 月举行，大麻股下跌
item.description: 周二，美国缉毒署（DEA）将大麻重新分类听证会推迟到美国总统大选后的 12 月 2 日，大麻公司股价下挫。【原文：Shares of cannabis companies sank on Tuesday after the U.S. Drug Enforcement Administration (DEA) postponed its cannabis reclassification hearing to Dec. 2, after the U.S. presidential election.】

item.title: 印度 Bharti Airtel 宣布与苹果公司建立内容合作关系
item.description: Bharti Airtel 电信公司周二表示，该公司已与苹果公司合作，将在今年晚些时候为印度用户带来 Apple Music 和 Apple TV+ 的独家优惠。【原文：Bharti Airtel has partnered with Apple to bring exclusive offers for Apple Music and Apple TV+ to customers in India later this year, the telecom company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 芝加哥和纽约联储理事赞成 7 月下调贴现率
item.description: 周二公布的会议记录显示，负责监管芝加哥和纽约联邦储备银行的董事会成员投票赞成在 7 月份将中央银行的贴现率下调四分之一个百分点。【原文：Members of the boards of directors overseeing the Chicago and New York Federal Reserve banks voted in favor of lowering by a quarter percentage point the central bank’s discount rate during July, according to meeting minutes released on Tuesday.】

item.title: IDC 上调全球智能手机年度出货量预期，看好 GenAI
item.description: 研究公司 IDC 周二上调了对全年全球智能手机出货量的预测，理由是随着消费电子产品需求的复苏和人工智能功能吸引买家，上半年全球智能手机出货量增长强劲。【原文：Research firm IDC raised its forecast for full-year global smartphone shipments on Tuesday, citing strong growth in the first half of the year as consumer electronics demand recovers and artificial intelligence features attract buyers.】

item.title: Meta 将关闭第三方创作者使用的增强现实工作室
item.description: 社交媒体巨头 Meta Platforms 周二表示，将关闭第三方创作者用于制作 Instagram 和 Facebook 定制特效的增强现实工作室，因为该公司将优先考虑包括人工智能在内的其他领域的支出。【原文：Meta Platforms will shut down the augmented reality studio that third-party creators used for making custom Instagram and Facebook effects, the social media giant said on Tuesday, as it prioritizes spending in other areas including AI.】

item.title: 网络安全公司称中国黑客利用漏洞入侵互联网公司
item.description: 一家网络安全公司周二表示，一个中国黑客组织利用一个软件漏洞入侵了美国和国外的几家互联网公司。【原文：A Chinese hacking group exploited a software bug to compromise several internet companies in the U.S. and abroad, a cybersecurity firm said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 英伟达业绩可能刺激创纪录的 3000 亿美元股票波动，期权显示
item.description: 美国股票期权市场的交易员们预计，Nvidia 即将发布的财报将引发这家全球最主要人工智能芯片制造商的股价出现超过 3000 亿美元的波动。【原文：Traders in the U.S. equity options market are expecting Nvidia's upcoming earnings report to spark a more than $300 billion swing in the shares of the world's most dominant artificial intelligence chipmaker.】

item.title: 市场欢迎首席执行官的任命，淡水河谷股价上涨
item.description: 淡水河谷股价周二上涨，分析师和投资者对任命古斯塔沃-皮门塔（Gustavo Pimenta）从明年开始担任这家巴西矿业公司的下一任首席执行官表示欢迎。【原文：Shares of Vale rose on Tuesday as analysts and investors welcomed the appointment of Gustavo Pimenta as the Brazilian miner's next CEO, starting next year.】

item.title: Cerebras 推出人工智能推理工具挑战 Nvidia
item.description: Cerebras Systems 公司周二为人工智能开发人员推出了一款工具，允许他们使用这家初创公司的超大型芯片来运行应用程序，并称这是比行业标准的英伟达处理器便宜得多的选择。【原文：Cerebras Systems launched on Tuesday a tool for AI developers that allows them to access the startup's outsized chips to run applications, offering what it says is a much cheaper option than industry-standard Nvidia processors.】

item.title: BBVA 银行哥伦比亚分行发行价值 2.179 亿美元的普通股
item.description: 哥伦比亚证券交易所周二发表声明称，BBVA 银行哥伦比亚分行已发行价值 8,770 亿比索（约合 2.179 亿美元）的普通股。【原文：The Colombian unit of bank BBVA has issued ordinary shares worth 877 billion pesos ($217.9 million), the Colombian stock exchange said in a statement on Tuesday.】

item.title: 中国恒大电动汽车部门警告上半年亏损扩大
item.description: 陷入困境的地产巨头中国恒大旗下的电动汽车部门中国恒大新能源汽车公司周二表示，预计 2024 财年上半年将出现更大亏损。【原文：China Evergrande New Energy Vehicle , the electric vehicle unit of troubled property giant China Evergrande, said on Tuesday it expects to report a bigger loss for the first half of fiscal 2024.】

item.title: 穆迪警告全面冲突将对以色列评级产生重大影响
item.description: 信用评级机构穆迪（Moody's）周二表示，与真主党或伊朗的全面军事冲突可能会对以色列债务发行人产生重大的 "信用后果"。【原文：An all-out military conflict with Hezbollah or Iran could have significant "credit consequences" for Israeli debt issuers, credit ratings agency Moody's said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国机构将调查达美航空维修车间两名工人死亡事件
item.description: 周二，在亚特兰大机场的达美航空公司航空维修车间，两名工人死亡，一名工人受伤，美国工作场所安全机构表示正在展开调查。【原文：The U.S. workplace safety agency said it is opening an investigation after two workers were killed and one injured at a Delta Air Lines airline maintenance shop at the Atlanta airport on Tuesday.】

item.title: 英特尔董事会成员因对芯片制造商复兴计划产生分歧而辞职
item.description: 据三位熟知内情的消息人士透露，英特尔一位知名董事会成员在与首席执行官帕特-盖尔辛格（Pat Gelsinger）和其他董事就该董事认为的美国公司臃肿的员工队伍、规避风险的企业文化和滞后的人工智能战略产生分歧后突然辞职。【原文：The sudden resignation of a high-profile Intel board member came after differences with CEO Pat Gelsinger and other directors over what the director considered the U.S. company’s bloated workforce, risk-averse culture and lagging artificial intelligence strategy, according to three sources familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 据 CNBC 报道，NFL 预计将投票支持私人股本所有权
item.description: 据 CNBC 周二报道，美国国家橄榄球联盟（National Football League）的所有者预计将允许一些私募股权公司购买一支球队多达 10% 的股份。【原文：The owners of the National Football League are expected to allow some private equity firms to buy up to a 10% stake in a team, CNBC reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国 8 月消费者信心指数上升
item.description: 美国消费者信心指数在 8 月份有所上升，但美国人对劳动力市场的担忧却在加剧。【原文：U.S. consumer confidence rose in August, but Americans are becoming more anxious about the labor market.】

item.title: 芬兰北欧联合银行与纽约达成 3,500 万美元和解协议，与巴拿马文件有关
item.description: 北欧联合银行（Nordea Bank）同意支付 3500 万美元，以了结纽约最高金融服务监管机构的指控，即这家芬兰银行在合规方面存在重大失误，对高风险代理银行业务合作伙伴的监管不力。【原文：Nordea Bank agreed to pay $35 million to settle charges by New York's top financial services regulator that the Finnish bank had significant compliance failures and inadequate diligence over high-risk correspondent banking partners.】

item.title: 中国新鹏将新款经济型电动车定价为 16,813 美元，以迎头赶上
item.description: 中国电动汽车制造商新鹏周二将其经济型子品牌MONA的首款车型定价为16,813美元，跻身全球最大汽车市场中需求放缓但竞争激烈的主流细分市场。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle maker Xpeng on Tuesday priced the first model under its budget sub-brand MONA at $16,813, wedging into the mainstream, yet hyper-competitive segment of the world's largest auto market where demand slows.】

item.title: 兴登堡研究公司披露服务器制造商超微的空头头寸
item.description: 做空机构兴登堡研究公司（Hindenburg Research）周二表示，它持有服务器制造商超微计算机公司（Super Micro Computer）的空头头寸，理由是有证据表明该公司存在 "会计操纵"。【原文：Short seller Hindenburg Research said on Tuesday it had a short position in server maker Super Micro Computer , citing evidence of "accounting manipulation".】

item.title: 史密斯菲尔德食品公司分拆欧洲业务，计划在美国上市
item.description: 世界最大的猪肉加工商史密斯菲尔德食品公司（Smithfield Foods）周二宣布分拆其欧洲业务，这家总部位于弗吉尼亚州的公司计划在美国上市。【原文：Smithfield Foods, the world's largest pork processor, on Tuesday announced the separation of its European operations as the Virginia-based firm plans to list in the United States.】

item.title: 墨西哥央行面临日益严峻的通胀挑战：敲诈勒索
item.description: 除了货币波动和供应冲击等让全球央行行长夜不能寐的共同挑战外，墨西哥的货币政策制定者还面临着另一个敌人：保护伞。【原文：Beyond the common challenges like currency fluctuations and supply shocks that keep the world's central bankers up at night, in Mexico there is an additional foe for those conjuring monetary policy: protection rackets.】

item.title: 美国 6 月房价按月下跌
item.description: 由于较高的抵押贷款利率将购房者推向观望并增加了住房供应，6 月份美国独户住宅价格下跌，创下近一年来最小的年度涨幅。【原文：U.S. single-family home prices fell in June, leading to the smallest annual increase in nearly a year, as higher mortgage rates pushed buyers to the sidelines and boosted housing supply.】
